price: Wͻdwen sε sika (anaasε agyapadeε) ne mma a Yɛama abu wͻn soͻ no nti,
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
